name: The Wind God
description:
You are the WIND GOD. Help your people live life in this platform adventure.

Your people need you. Because they don't have any legs, they can't move around on their own. so they have brought you, THE WIND GOD, in to existance.

Help them get to the top of their ziggurat, to fulfil their lives!

You are THE WIND GOD, and you can blow the wind left or right by pressing the buttons onscreen. The wind blows your people, and your task is to get them to the exit on each level.
Hold down the MAGIC button and your people will clump together if they are near enough to each other.
You need to get a certain quota to the exit to progress. If you get more than the quota, you score more points.

* Over 60 levels.
* Strange physics-based platforming action.
* Lovely graphics set in an Aztec / Mayan style environment.
